httpserver

Class HTTPHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • httpserver.HTTPHandlerFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoHTTPHandlerFactory

    public abstract class HTTPHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    An HTTPHandlerFactory is a factory that's used to determine what kind of HTTPHandler should be used in the HTTPRequest.
    See Also:
    HTTPHandler, HTTPRequest

      abstract HTTPHandler determineHandler(java.lang.String pathSegment, HTTPRequest request)
      Figures out what kind of HTTPHandler should be used to set the response data.
